Tool Call.parsed_plan: SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_name, p.product_name FROM orders o INNER JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.order_date >= '2024-01-01'

optimization_suggestions: Consider using merge join for orders-customers join due to large table sizes
Add index on products.product_id for faster nested loop performance
Reorder joins to process products-orders first to reduce intermediate result size
